__e: Well, excuse me, Saint Francis of assisi, but some people work for a living.
Many nights your mother cried because of Franz's mother.
It won`t be easy now that Albert SchweitZer is dead and St. Francis of Assisi, I hear, isn`t too well, either.
Because Franz Joseph told me he loves you.
You renounced the throne yourself because you love Franz-Josef. You made sacrifices and did everything just to make him happy.
Franz Joseph is my son, yet he uses formal etiquette with me.
There was a time when Franz...
Franz told me many good things about you.
